name: Maddie's Dino Adventure
description:
Help Maddie escape undead dinosaurs! Maddie is a small girl, who has been trapped in the desert. She is surrounded by skeletal remains of the past, which are out to get her. The only thing helping her in this endeavor is her trusty scythe.
Not only can it kill enemies, but it also has magical powers that bind her to the skeletons! With the help of her scythe, she can roam the skies and reach the end!
